title: Will the child born out of wedlock be punished on day of judgement for his parents sin Assimalhakeem
transcript: his second question we heard that a child born of wedlock will be punished on the day of judgment because of his father's and mother's sin is that true totally baseless and bogus what is the crime of a child born out of wedlock was anybody did anybody ask him your parents want to commit uh fornication so it's okay with you no so he's not to be blamed or to be reprimanded or to be looked down at at all
